remarks: Property deduction for polynomial base set.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Mar-2015.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 19-Jul-2019.)
statement:
psrplusgpropd.b1 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
psrplusgpropd.b2 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` S ) ) $.
psrplusgpropd.p $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` R ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` S ) y ) ) $.
mplbaspropd $p |- ( ph -> ( Base ` ( I mPoly R ) ) = ( Base ` ( I mPoly S ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
